463:1: atha khalu bhagavānimā gāthā bhāṣitvā sarvāvantaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma-ārocayāmi vo bhikṣavaḥ,
463:3: ayaṃ mama śrāvakaḥ kāśyapo bhikṣustriṃśato buddhakoṭīsahasrāṇāmantike satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
463:5: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saddharmaṃ dhārayiṣyati|
463:6: sa paścime samucchraye avabhāsaprāptāyāṃ lokadhātau mahāvyūhe kalpe raśmiprabhāso nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān|
463:10: taccāsya buddhakṣetraṃ śuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati śuci apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhalyamapagataśvabhraprapātamapagatasyandanikāgūtholigallaṃ samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ vaiḍūryamayaṃ ratnavṛkṣapratimaṇḍitaṃ suvarṇasūtrāṣṭāpadanibaddhaṃ puṣpābhikīrṇam|
463:13: na ca tatra māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ lapsyate,
463:16: api tu khalu punastatra lokadhātau tasyaiva bhagavato raśmiprabhāsasya tathāgatasya śāsane saddharmaparigrahāyābhiyuktā bhaviṣyanti||
463:17: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
463:54: atha khalvāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ sthavira āyuṣmāṃśca subhūtirāyuṣmāṃśca mahākātyāyanaḥ pravepamānaiḥ kāyairbhagavantamanimiṣairnetrairvyavalokayanti sma|
463:55: tasyāṃ ca velāyāṃ pṛthak pṛthaṅamanaḥsaṃgītyā imā gāthā abhāṣanta—
463:65: yathā hastasmi prakṣiptaṃ na tadbhuñjīta bhojanam||14||
463:66: evaṃ ca utsukā vīra śrutvā ghoṣamanuttaram|
463:70: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣā mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ sthavirāṇāmimamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya punarapi sarvāvantaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma-ayaṃ me bhikṣavo mahāśrāvakaḥ sthaviraḥ subhūtistriṃśata eva buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
463:74: evaṃrūpāṃścādhikārān kṛtvā paścime samucchraye śaśiketurnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān|
463:75: ratnasaṃbhavaṃ ca nāmāsya tad buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati|
463:86: sa ca bhagavān vaihāyasamantarīkṣe sthitvā abhīkṣṇaṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
463:87: bahūni ca bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni ca śrāvakaśatasahasrāṇi vineṣyati||
463:88: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
463:121: atha khalu bhagavān punareva sarvāvantaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma-ārocayāmi vo bhikṣayaḥ,
463:123: ayaṃ mama śrāvakaḥ sthaviro mahākātyāyano'ṣṭānāṃ buddhakoṭīśatasahasrāṇāmantike satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
463:125: parinirvṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ stūpān kariṣyati yojanasahasraṃ samucchrayeṇa pañcāśad yojanāni pariṇāhena saptānāṃ ratnānām|
463:126: tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamukteraśmargabhasya musāragalvasya saptamasya ratnasya|
463:128: tataśca bhūyaḥ pareṇa paratareṇa punarviśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnāmantike evarūpameva satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
463:130: sa paścime samucchraye paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe jāmbūnadaprabhāso nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavan|
463:131: pariśuddhaṃ cāsya buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ sphaṭikamayaṃ ratnavṛkṣābhivicitritaṃ suvarṇasūtrācchoḍitaṃ puṣpasaṃstarasaṃstṛtamapagatanirayatiryagyoniyamalokāsurakāyaṃ bahunaradevapratipūrṇaṃ bahuśrāvakaśatasahasropaśobhitaṃ bahubodhisattvaśatasahasrālaṃkṛtam|
463:135: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
463:153: amitā asaṃkhyā pi ca tatra kṣetre|
463:156: atha khalu bhagavān punareva sarvāvantaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma-ārocayāmi vo bhikṣavaḥ,
463:159: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ vividhaṃ satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
463:161: parinirvṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ stūpān kārayiṣyati saptaratnamayān|
463:162: tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaidūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamukteraśmagarbhasya musāragalvasya|
463:164: teṣāṃ ca stūpānāṃ vividhāṃ pūjāṃ kariṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhiḥ|
463:165: tataśca bhūyaḥ pareṇa paratareṇa viṃśaterbuddhakoṭīśatasahasrāṇāmevaṃrūpameva satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
463:167: paścime ca ātmabhāvapratilambhe tamālapatracandanagandho nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān|
463:171: samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ sudarśanīyaṃ sphaṭikamayaṃ ratnavṛkṣābhivicitritaṃ muktakusumābhikīrṇaṃ bahunaradevapratipūrṇamṛṣiśatasahasraniṣevitaṃ yaduta śrāvakaiśca bodhisattvaiśca|
463:175: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
